name: The Overthinking Snake
description:
The Overthinking Snake is a A pixel art and narrative game about

Sam, the snake of the arcade world who is exploring the universe to find the
meaning of life. Sam was a normal snake who spent all of his life among the walls, but something changed on his 99th birthday.

The universe outside the walls was vast and empty, Sam started wondering about the origin of life, the possibility of finding another creatures or being the only one in the whole world. Listen to Sam's unlimited train of thoughts and find out what happens to him in this multiple ending adventure.
